Reviews.Title: Thank you Guys!
Reviews.Author: Onny
Reviews.Content: HTC surround is the best phone I ever had,Isn't factory unlock but is working with different sim cards just fine.For this price is very good quality and I'll recommend it.Inside package you will find;phone,battery and power charger with PC connection cableGood luck!.

Reviews.Title: love
Reviews.Author: Harry H.
Reviews.Content: my 1st fone it came when it was supposed to its great this is a great steal GO BUY IT

Reviews.Title: hello smartphone!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: ChaChaGirl
Reviews.Content: for the record i say that this phone is ... PERFECT !!!!!!!!! and i found out that you can play xbox on this.you know this is my first phone ever.and i just want  to say awesome!!!!! htc is great.and 3g network ... $$$$$$$ ;)

ProductInfo.Features:
3G-enabled Windows Phone 7 smartphone with 3.8-inch touchscreen and slide-out speakers with Dolby Mobile and SRS surround sound
Windows Phone 7 OS provides easy access to social networking, personal/corporate e-mail, office apps, Xbox LIVE games, streaming media, and more
5-megapixel camera with HD 720p video capture
16 GB internal memory;Wireless-N Wi-Fi;Bluetooth stereo music; GPS for navigation and location services
Up to 4 hours of talk time, up to 264 hours (11 days) of standby time; released in November, 2010
ProductInfo.Name: HTC 7 Surround T8788 Unlocked GSM/3G Windows Phone 7 with Touchscreen, 5MP Camera, Music player, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth
